example.text: Through the app, the CCP is able to access your search browser history, text messages, biometric data, credit card information, and more. Make no mistake, the CCP will exploit every resource at their fingertips to undermine the United States and freedom around the world.

This Congress needs to lead instead of allowing partisan gridlock to derail progress. I look forward to working with the Problem Solvers Caucus to find common sense solutions to cut inflation, restore the SALT Deduction, build a 21st century economy that promotes innovation, and keep our communities safe.

News from Congressman Tom Kean Our District Services Connect On Social Media About Tom Issues Dear , Leaders listen to those you represent and find ways to be part of the governing coalition to affect positive change. During my tenure in the state legislature, I reined in wasteful spending, kept government accountable, and built new downtown economies using that philosophy.

As chair of the House Foreign Affairs Subcommittee on Europe, you can count on me to fight for the Ukrainian people, to prioritize our country's continued support of Ukraine, and to make it clear to the rest of the world that we will not allow Putin to succeed in his unprovoked war of aggression. I will be introducing a resolution in Congress that marks the one-year anniversary of the Russian invasion of Ukraine, praises the will of the Ukrainian people, and affirms US support.

Victory means ending the war, driving Putin's forces out, and ensuring Ukraine is strong enough to deter future Russian aggression. One year ago, many said that Kyiv would fall within weeks, maybe even days.
